content: Oh wow, that would be quite an unsettling visual! The idea of the parasite trying to infect the player definitely adds an extra layer of horror to the Fissionator. Another idea for the Fissionator's appearance could be that it has a bulky, heavily-armored suit that's been fused to its body due to the radiation. The suit could have a glowing green energy core that's constantly pulsing with radiation, and maybe the Fissionator's attacks could involve it unleashing bursts of radioactive energy from the core. The suit could also have various tools and weapons built into it, such as drills and saws, which could make for some interesting attack patterns.
